######################################

#leader_trait_adaptable_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_aggressive_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_aggressive_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_aggressive }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_aggressive_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_aggressive_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_aggressive_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_aggressive_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_aggressive_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_gifted }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_gifted_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_gifted_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_gifted_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_gifted_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_gifted_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

}


#leader_trait_artillerist_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_artillerist_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_artillerist_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_artillerist_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_admiral }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_artillerist }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_artillerist_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_artillerist_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_artillerist_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_artillerist_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_artillerist_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_admiral }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_artillery_specialization }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_admiral }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_carrier_specialization }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }

        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_commanding_presence_3 } }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no

    }

    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_heavy_hitter_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_heavy_hitter }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_heavy_hitter_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_heavy_hitter_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_heavy_hitter_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_heavy_hitter_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_heavy_hitter_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_wrecker }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_wrecker_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_wrecker_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_wrecker_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_wrecker_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_wrecker_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_arbiter_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_arbiter } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_arbiter
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_arbiter }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_arbiter }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_arbiter }
    }

            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_arbiter }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }

		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }

    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_taskmaster
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_taskmaster }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}
